cmb:
MANA COST: 150/150/150/150
COOLDOWN: 12
desc: Puck launches magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
notes:
The Illusory Orb grants flying vision around its location while it travels.
Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.
lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
name: puck_illusory_orb

cmb:
MANA COST: 100/110/120/130
COOLDOWN: 16
desc: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
name: puck_waning_rift

cmb:
MANA COST: 0/0/0/0
COOLDOWN: 6
desc: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
notes:
Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
name: puck_phase_shift

desc: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
name: puck_ethereal_jaunt

attrib:
BREAK STUN: 1.5 / 2.25 / 3
BREAK RADIUS: 600 / 600 / 600
COIL DURATION: 6 / 6 / 6
BREAK DAMAGE: 100 / 150 / 200
SCEPTER COIL DURATION: 8 / 8 / 8
SCEPTER BREAK DAMAGE: 200 / 250 / 300
SCEPTER BREAK STUN DURATION: 1.5 / 3 / 4.5
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/150/200
COOLDOWN: 85
desc:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for .5 seconds and damaging them. If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, deals damage again and stuns.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: The initial stun and damage can be blocked by Linken's Sphere, but the target will still be affected by the coils.
lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
name: puck_dream_coil
